Country code + digits only (e.g., 60123456789 for Malaysia)

WhatsApp Connection Status

API Information

Backend API: https://whatsapp-api-server-production-c15f.up.railway.app

Proxy Endpoints (CORS-free):

  • POST /api/whatsapp/send - Send WhatsApp message
  • GET /api/whatsapp/status - Get connection status (ready, hasQR)
  • GET /api/whatsapp/qr - Get QR code for authentication

Phone Format: Country code + digits only (e.g., 60123456789)

Rate Limit: Max 1 message per second
